summary: This is an email from an NYPD detective on a child exploitation and human trafficking task force, dated December 15, 2021, detailing attempts to contact a person named Igor. The detective reports that a female associate of Igor stated Igor did not want to talk, specifically asked if the contact was about Jeffrey Epstein, and claimed Igor was not a witness and not scheduled to testify for the defense.

persons.name: Igor
persons.role: Individual sought for contact regarding the Epstein case
persons.context: The NYPD detective is attempting to contact Igor, but a female associate states Igor does not want to talk, is not a witness, and is not scheduled to testify for the defense.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Deceased financier and accused sex trafficker
persons.context: The female associate of Igor specifically asks if the detective's contact attempt is about Jeffrey Epstein, indicating the context of the investigation.

connections.description: The female associate's question linking Igor to Epstein suggests Igor may have some connection or knowledge relevant to the Epstein case.

events.title: Initial contact attempt with Igor's associate
events.description: An NYPD detective called a phone number associated with Igor and spoke with an unnamed female who said Igor was not home and she would pass along a message.

events.title: Follow-up contact and statement about Epstein
events.description: The detective called again, spoke with the same female, who stated Igor did not want to talk, asked if it was about Jeffrey Epstein, and said Igor was not a witness and not scheduled to testify for the defense.

keyFacts: An NYPD detective from a child exploitation and human trafficking task force was actively attempting to contact an individual named Igor in December 2021 regarding the Jeffrey Epstein case.
A female associate of Igor stated that Igor did not want to talk to anyone and specifically asked if the contact was about Jeffrey Epstein.
The female associate claimed, on Igor's behalf, that he was 'not a witness to anything' and was 'not scheduled to testify for the defense in this case'.
The communication indicates ongoing investigative efforts by law enforcement related to the Epstein case years after Epstein's death.
